simulation.manager

Class AbstractManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulation.manager.AbstractManager

  • public abstract class AbstractManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract management of simulation. Manages local and global indicators, clock, agent population in simulation and policy agents. Saves policies using indicators.
    Author:
    Simon
